Catalog Emoji features
Create a catalog of all available Emoji features and display them by rarity. Allow users to search for Emojis by specific features.

Emoji metadata on blockchain
Store metadata about Emoji features on the blockchain, allowing for better tracking and organization of the Emojis. Enhance filtering options on Opensea to make it easier for users to find the Emojis they're looking for.

High resolution Emojis
Create a new collection of Emojis with higher resolution (512x512px) and more vibrant colors.

Mystery chest
Create an NFT that contains a hidden random coin, adding an element of surprise and excitement for users.
